title: Shadow Children Boxed Set: Among the Hidden, Among the Impostors, Among the Betrayed, and Among the Barons
description: Imagine a world where families are allowed only two children. Illegal third children -- shadow children -- must live in hiding. If they are discovered, there is only one Death.Among the HiddenAn ALA Best Book for Young AdultsAn ALA Quick Pick for Reluctant Young Adult ReadersAn American Booksellers Association Kids' Pick of the ListAmong the ImpostorsInternational Reading Association Young Adults' ChoiceAmong the BetrayedAn America Library Association Quick PickInternational Reading Association/Children's Book Council Children's Choice
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix
